lead_paragraph: U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said on Tuesday that lawmakers would continue to press for new sanctions against Tehran "until the regime ends its violent, provocative behavior against the U.S. and our allies."

headline.main: Ryan Says U.S. Congress Will Press for New Sanctions Against Iran
headline.print_headline: Ryan Says U.S. Congress Will Press for New Sanctions Against Iran

snippet: U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said on Tuesday that lawmakers would continue to press for new sanctions against Tehran "until the regime ends its violent, provocative behavior against the U.S. and our allies."
